magiclogin by stenehall

Creates the illusion of one input being used for both username and password

21 November 2010

Code example

jQuery(document).ready(function() {
	jQuery('#magiclogin-container').magiclogin();
});

Example

Download

You can download this project in either zip or tar formats.

You can also clone the project with Git by running:

$ git clone git://github.com/stenehall/jQuery.magiclogin

Discussion

Get the source code on GitHub : stenehall/jQuery.magiclogin
